verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> speaketh <S%G3004><s%> expressly <S%G4490><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the latter <S%G5306><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> shall depart from <S%G868><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>, giving heed <S%G4337><s%> to seducing <S%G4108><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> doctrines <S%G1319><s%> of devils <S%G1140><s%>;
Speaking lies <S%G5573><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%>; having <S%G2743><s%> their <S%G2398><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> seared with a hot iron <S%G2743><s%>;

Forbidding <S%G2967><s%> to marry <S%G1060><s%>, and commanding to abstain from <S%G567><s%> meats <S%G1033><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath created <S%G2936><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be received <S%G3336><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> of them which believe <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1921><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2938><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is good <S%G2570><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to be refused <S%G579><s%>, if it be received <S%G2983><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%>:
For <S%G1063><s%> it is sanctified <S%G37><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayer <S%G1783><s%>.

If thou put <S%G5294><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> in remembrance <S%G5294><s%> of these things <S%G5023><s%>, thou shalt be <S%G2071><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, nourished up <S%G1789><s%> in the words <S%G3056><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of good <S%G2570><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%>, whereunto <S%G3739><s%> thou hast attained <S%G3877><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> refuse <S%G3868><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> old wives' <S%G1126><s%> fables <S%G3454><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> exercise <S%G1128><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> rather unto <S%G4314><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> bodily <S%G4984><s%> exercise <S%G1129><s%> profiteth <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5624><s%> little <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3641><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> profitable <S%G5624><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%> of the life <S%G2222><s%> that now is <S%G3568><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of that which is to come <S%G3195><s%>.
This is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> acceptation <S%G594><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> therefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2872><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> labour <S%G2872><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> suffer reproach <S%G3679><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> we trust <S%G1679><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Saviour <S%G4990><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, specially <S%G3122><s%> of those that believe <S%G4103><s%>.

Let <S%G2706><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> youth <S%G3503><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> be thou <S%G1096><s%> an example <S%G5179><s%> of the believers <S%G4103><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> charity <S%G26><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> purity <S%G47><s%>.
Till <S%G2193><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%>, give attendance <S%G4337><s%> to reading <S%G320><s%>, to exhortation <S%G3874><s%>, to doctrine <S%G1319><s%>.

Neglect <S%G272><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the gift <S%G5486><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> prophecy <S%G4394><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> the laying on <S%G1936><s%> of the hands <S%G5495><s%> of the presbytery <S%G4244><s%>.

Meditate upon <S%G3191><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>; give thyself <S%G2468><s%> wholly to <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G5125><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> profiting <S%G4297><s%> may <S%G5600><s%> appear <S%G5318><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.

Take heed <S%G1907><s%> unto thyself <S%G4572><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto the doctrine <S%G1319><s%>; continue <S%G1961><s%> in them <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> in doing <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thou shalt <S%G4982><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> them that hear <S%G191><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>.
